basics.name: Halil Bozdoğan
basics.label: Senior Software / DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: I am an experienced Senior Software Engineer with a strong background in managing and developing large government projects, optimizing codebases, and ensuring system security. I have successfully led teams in making crucial technical decisions, including selecting technology stacks and implementing high availability and fault tolerance measures. My expertise includes migrating old .Net Core projects, configuring CI/CD operations, converting Windows Service projects to Docker containers, and deploying to Kubernetes clusters. I have also contributed to requirements analysis, training, and architecture design. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated my ability to deliver high-quality results and excel in complex software development environments.

work.name: Tiga Bilgi Teknolojileri A.Ş.
work.summary:
- Develop and manage large government projects.
- Design and develop high availability and fault tolerance systems.
- Make the decisions for tech stack on projects as a technical leader.
- Code Optimization on large and old code bases.
- Migrating old .Net Core projects to recent framework versions. Mainly 2.x to newer lts versions
- Fixing security related bugs.
- Configuration for CI/CD Operations with TFS and On-Premise Kubernetes
- Converting Windows Service projects to Docker containers and deploying to Kubernetes clusters

projects.name: National Health System - e-Nabiz
projects.summary:
Collecting Patient treatments and visits from Health care providers around the country. Displaying laboratory results, prescriptions, and treatment details to individuals through the e-Nabiz portal

- Over 1 million daily requests from Health Care providers.
- Over 6 million patient data with 20 TB+ capacity on NoSQL (Couchbase) Database.
- 150+ Servers on NoSQL (Couchbase) Database.
- Serving e-Nabiz Portal with high availability.
- Integration with other systems in or outside of the Ministry of Health which includes Diagnostic Imaging services.
- Migrating old windows service applications to Docker Containers
- Deployment and Configuration for Kubernetes Ecosystem which includes MetalLB, Nginx-ingress, Harbor Registry

projects.name: Ministry of Youth and Sports - E-Transition System
projects.summary:
This project aims to digitize all of the Ministry's operations on the digital platform for reducing paperwork and speeding up internal correspondence between divisions.

- Finding bottlenecks in legacy code.
- Designing and developing reports for various modules.
- Helping junior staff with their assignments.

projects.name: Turkey Scholarships Application System
projects.summary:
Turkey Scholarship is government-based funding for international students. This project enables international students to apply and track their applications and ask questions and receive notifications for their application status and other information for Scholarships. The scholarship Staff portal contains various integrations with other systems like Law enforcement for tracking students’ arrivals and leavings from the country, tracking their academic grades with the council of higher education.

- Azure Cloud Project, Webapps, Azure Functions, Azure SQL Database.
- Service-Based architecture for easy scalability.
- In 2019 over 150 thousand applications within one month.
- Performance monitoring and finding bugs with Application Insights.
- Very detailed application filtering for decision-makers on the portal.
- Complex application filtering for decision-makers on the portal.

projects.name: Internal Company Portal For HR and Finance
projects.summary:
With this project we simplified HR and Finance Departments records keeping, work flows and reporting needs for our company.

- Requirement analysis.
- Deciding technologies in project with minimum TCO and scalability.
- Identifying work flows for Finance Department with client meetings and on field analysis.
- Developing Security and Auditing modules as library for easy to use.
- Concept visual designs of modules.

projects.name: Network Device Monitoring And Management
projects.summary:
As a Turkish Armed Forces project, we monitored and manage 1000+ devices over network from central location and gathered reports from them.

- After analyzing customer bug reports and field experiences, determined the bottlenecks of application and work flows.
- Optimizing old code for performance and bug fixes.
- Adapting new technologies for better system reliability.
- Planning resources for new customer requests.

projects.name: Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey Service Integration
projects.summary:
Integration between CBRT Announcement Service (Reuters Marketlink Based) to Anadolu Agency Finance Data Portal AAFinans (https://aafinans.com)

- Analyze Reuters Marketlink message protocol (RS232 Serial Port Communications).
- Analyze Template and Partial Message update system.
- Receiving update messages from serial port and applying them on correct announcement templates.
- Keeping version history for messages and announcements.
- Displaying announcements on web portal.

projects.name: Loyalty Framework
projects.summary:
Base framework and components for future projects in Innova Payment and Finance Division.

- Requirements analysis, choosing technologies for components.
- Developing SMS Component (WCF Service) and applying usage in sample project.
- Consulting on Auction Service Development.

projects.name: Turk Telekom Kurumsal Marka - Turk Telekom Corporate Brand
projects.summary:
Creating a loyalty system for Enterprise customers with partnering outside brands using SMS Services.

- Integration between Telekom and Outside services using .NET Technologies.
- Parsing SMSs comes from customers for error correction and similarity analysis with RegEx.
- Using SOAP Trace library that I developed, saving XML requests from outside services. Making easy to find errors and achieving better system stability.
- Identify Server needs for Web and Application projects.
- IIS and WCF configurations for scalability on customer’s servers and management.
- Analyzing security reports and fixing insecure codes.

projects.name: Bizimle Kazan, Turk Telekom Enterprise Loyalty System
projects.summary:
Creating Loyalty system for TT Enterprise Customers who choosing commitments for their bills and usages.

- Developing Library using DSL for determining money penalty who cancels commitment before end time.
- Integration for Telekom services across various groups (Finance, Customer Relations …).
- Development of scheduled tasks using Quartz.NET library and provided management interface for end users.
- Active analysis of code for security and fixing necessary sections after independent reports.
- Deploying many WCF Services with single shared base and optimizing IIS for better startup, uptime, and scalability.
- Deployments of Web and Application servers for client.

projects.name: TT Nokta – Multimedia Payphone
projects.summary:
Producing 100+ pay phones which provide what current pay phones don’t carry such as Internet services, SMS, E-Mail, Video telephony, taking pictures and capturing videos at the same time as an ordinary phone call.

- Simplified Image based deployment solution. Ready to start HDD preparations with full user experience.
- Automatic Backup - Update - Restore solution with using minimal bandwidth over Remote Web Services.
- URL control for Internet Module. (using Regex only valid URLs can be entered to address bar and disables in URL malicious).
- Application and Web Server load balancing and security configurations. Optimizing IIS App Pool parameters for scalability.
